snippet: The scandal over horse meat sold as beef re-emerged with a Dutch alert about 50,000 tons of meat sold in Europe and a recall of a product in Britain containing a veterinary drug.
lead_paragraph: The scandal over horse meat sold as beef re-emerged with a Dutch alert about 50,000 tons of meat sold in Europe and a recall of a product in Britain containing a veterinary drug.

headline.seo: Horse Meat Problems Resurface Across Europe
headline.main: Horse Meat Problems Resurface Across Europe
headline.print_headline: Horse Meat Problems Resurface Across Europe
